name: dexterity-sdk
description: SDK for interacting with Dexterity AMM protocol

scripts.prepare: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run test && npm run build
scripts.publish:check: git diff-index --quiet HEAD || (echo 'Working directory not clean. Please commit or stash changes first.' && exit 1)
scripts.publish:next: npm run publish:check && npm version prerelease --preid=rc && npm publish --tag next && git push && git push --tags
scripts.publish:latest: npm run publish:check && npm version prerelease --preid=rc && npm publish --tag next && npm dist-tag add dexterity-sdk@$(npm pkg get version | sed 's/"//g') latest && git push && git push --tags
